section.name: Powered by Struts

b.font: Pages linked here must indicate that they are "powered by Struts" or otherwise credit the Apache Software Foundation pursuant to item 3 of the Apache Software License ("This product includes software developed by the Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/)."

section.p: Application-Servers.com - French site.
Clickstart Tutoring - One on one in home tutoring.
dbForms - RAD framework for database applications.
Enitel - French site.
FixAFest.nu - Party planning site (in Swedish Only).
Get To Hawaii - B2B Travel Service Provider
Hallmark Stories - "Tell the story behind your photos".
iKnowBase - The Knowledge Engine.
IronMax - B2B site; see Equipment Information Products.
IPIPI - e-Mail to SMS delivery service.
Jcorporate.com - open source and shared source commercial applications.
MilitaryHire - Job and resume site for veterans
New Dawn Art - Social and spiritual art on the Internet.
Normad - Web Timesheet Management System.
Pizza Hut Online / Sydney Metro - For pickup or delivery in the Sydney Metro area.
ReadyMinds Jobs - Online job posting and placement system using Struts and Tiles on JBoss and Tomcat.
Review Alert - Free service that allows you to be notified when new reviews are posted on Amazon.com for dvds, music cds, books on any topic.
South African Revenue Services - Directive and certificate service.
Red Galleon - Offer aggregator.
Review Alert - Review notification service for monitoring reviews on Amazon.com products.
TeaTimeJ - Website and Java hosting.
webAppWriter - write and deploy a J2EE app in 15 minutes.
WindSurfPassion - Dedicated to windsurfing.
WXXI Spring MarketPlace 2001 - Online auction for Public Television station.
Yos Solutions - Struts consulting, coaching and workshops. (German)
